languages.text: Еле заметные следы то ли крови то ли еще каких телесных ошметков.

traits.locale_text: Еле заметные следы то ли крови то ли еще каких телесных ошметков.

languages.text: Несколько чудом не затоптанных капель крови. Выглядит не слишком свежей, но и не полностью запекшейся.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.
languages.original_text: Несколько чудом не затоптанных капель крови. Выглядит не слишком свежей, но и не полностью запекшейся.

traits.locale_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow avoided being trampled upon. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but neither has it fully dried yet.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow avoided being trampled upon. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but neither has it fully dried yet.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.
You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

languages.text: Reparas en unas gotas de sangre que nadie ha pisado por pura suerte. No parece muy fresca, pero tampoco se ha secado por completo.
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

traits.locale_text: Reparas en unas gotas de sangre que nadie ha pisado por pura suerte. No parece muy fresca, pero tampoco se ha secado por completo.

languages.text: あなたは、踏まれずに残っていた血痕が数滴あるのに気づいた。血は新鮮ではないようだがが、完全に乾いているわけでもない。
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

traits.locale_text: あなたは、踏まれずに残っていた血痕が数滴あるのに気づいた。血は新鮮ではないようだがが、完全に乾いているわけでもない。

languages.text: 不知为何，有几滴鲜血并没有被人踩到。这些血迹看起来已经在这里一段时间了，但还没有彻底干透。
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

traits.locale_text: 不知为何，有几滴鲜血并没有被人踩到。这些血迹看起来已经在这里一段时间了，但还没有彻底干透。

languages.text: Du bemerkst einige Blutstropfen, auf denen aus irgendeinem Grund noch niemand herumgetrampelt ist. Das Blut scheint nicht mehr frisch zu sein, ist aber auch noch nicht vollständig eingetrocknet.
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

traits.locale_text: Du bemerkst einige Blutstropfen, auf denen aus irgendeinem Grund noch niemand herumgetrampelt ist. Das Blut scheint nicht mehr frisch zu sein, ist aber auch noch nicht vollständig eingetrocknet.

languages.text: Vous remarquez quelques gouttes de sang par terre ; étrangement, personne n'a encore marché dessus. Le sang n'a pas l'air si frais que ça, mais il n'a pas encore complètement séché.
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.

traits.locale_text: Vous remarquez quelques gouttes de sang par terre ; étrangement, personne n'a encore marché dessus. Le sang n'a pas l'air si frais que ça, mais il n'a pas encore complètement séché.

languages.text: Bir şekilde çiğnenmekten kurtulmuş birkaç kan damlasını fark ediyorsun. Kan, o kadar da taze görünmüyor. Ancak tam olarak kurumuş da sayılmaz.
languages.original_text: You notice a few drops of blood that have somehow managed to avoid being trodden on. The blood does not appear all that fresh, but it has not fully dried yet either.
